title: Ticket #5986: Selector shouldn't allocate fd_sets if checking a single fd
description: The Selector class contains an optimization to use poll() instead of select() when checking the status of a single fd. But it still allocates and initializes fd_sets in this case. We should improve it to avoid these operations when only one fd is being queried.
